summary: This bill, the Study And Framework for Efficiency in Food Oversight and Organizational Design Act of 2025 (SAFE FOOD Act of 2025), mandates the Secretary of Agriculture to study the potential consolidation of federal food safety agencies, including the Food Safety and Inspection Service, the Food and Drug Administration, and the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, into a single agency. The bill requires the Secretary to submit a report to Congress within one year of enactment, outlining the study's findings and any recommendations regarding the consolidation.
